transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Manish sir isse baat kar rahe the IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha ji sir, support kar de raha hu aap photo ka bol rahe ho na.
Customer: Ha sir maine na photo and kuch price maine details dala hai actually isme aur bhi cheeze hoti hai.
Customer: To ek baar mai bata deta hu.
Customer: Kyunki ek product tha sir aapka Bose naam se to wo brand name hai.
Customer: Jo ki agar mai dusre Google se detail bhi dalunga to kahi brand
Customer: usme issue na aaye sir.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: To Bose ka matlab kya hum log sir ye trading kar rahe hai ya kuch mai to manufacturing bhi kar rahe hai third party.
Executive: Trading, trading kar rahe hai.
Customer: Trading kar rahe hai, okay.
Customer: To yaha par sir jo hai na category me aapne jo liya hai na wo kahi na kahi aapko thoda sa waise issue aa sakta hai in future kyuki kahi na kahi hum log na us product ko.
Executive: Bolo khali kar do.
Customer: Bose wale ko hatwa diya sir?
Executive: Kis ko hata diya?
Customer: Nahi aap bol rahe hai sir khali kar diya mai samjha nahi kuch.
Executive: Are aapko nahi bolna tha aap bolo kya bol rahe ho aap.
Customer: Mai ye bol raha hu sir maine teen product ka na detail dala hai ek baar mai uska detail bata de raha hu.
Customer: Bose thermal camera product name hai price iska 80000 hai.
Executive: Camera hai already thermal imaging camera hai na usme aap usko map kar do.
Executive: Thermal imaging camera se product dali hui hai na.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha wahi product hai wo.
Customer: Sir ye to Bose to ek brand ho gaya na sir ye uske andar map hoga nahi ye bilkul different ho gaya.
Executive: Are sir to hata do phir.
Customer: To ye hatana padega theek hai mai ek baar dekh leta hu aap ek baar IndiaMART open kariega.
Executive: Open hi hai.
Customer: Laptop me hai sir abhi ya system me?
Executive: Laptop me.
Customer: Laptop me hai aur niche left hand side me setting ka option hai us pe click kariega.
Executive: Ha kar diya.
Executive: Kar diya bataiye.
Customer: Click karo sir top pe dekhiyega buylead preference page hoga ek us pe click kariega.
Executive: Ha kar diya.
Customer: Niche ki taraf aayenge category preference dikhega aapko bottom side pe.
Customer: Ek jo beech wala jo chart dikh raha hoga na based on your buylead consumption bracket me three yaha par do product ke name aa rahe hai.
Executive: Dono ko hata do.
Customer: Nahi ultrasonic me aap deal nahi karte na product aapne add karwaaya tha maine add bhi kar diya hai.
Executive: Already dala hai ultrasonic pulse velocity tester dala hua hai.
Executive: Usi me usko.
Customer: Ye concrete tester me kaam nahi karna sir.
Executive: Ha usko maine actually cross karke hata diya abhi sahi ho gaya sir.
Customer: Sir waha se to cross ho gaya aapko concrete tester ka kaam nahi chahiye kya sir?
Executive: Concrete tester aur ultrasonic pulse velocity tester hai na dono ek hi hai.
Customer: Sir dono ek hai I can understand but sir concrete tester se buyer is naam se bhi search karke aata hai.
Executive: Usko map kar do na aap usko.
Customer: Sir map hi kara but aapne hata diya sir aap wahi suno mai wahi bata raha tha.
Executive: Turant bol rahe ki ho nahi payega turant bolte ho.
Customer: Sir wo to maine already product map kar diya but sir ye bhi hota hai wahi to mai call pe bhi bol raha hu.
Customer: Bose wala jo hai wo brand name hai uske liye issue hai ki wo hatana padega.
Executive: Ha hat gaya.
Customer: Hata sir wo cross karke nahi karna hai sir ek second mere ko time de dijiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aapke cross se mark nahi karna tha koi issue nahi but agar kar diya hai to right hand side me search bar ka option hai sir.
Executive: Setting me.
Customer: Ha not preferred category likha hoga.
Customer: Iske right me sir iske right me.
Executive: Ha hai.
Customer: Not preferred category me search likhne ka matlab type karne ka option dikhega theek hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Waha par type kariye Bose thermal camera.
Customer: Theek hai niche ek by system automatic aa raha hoga us pe click karke add karna hai.
Executive: Kar diya.
Customer: Theek hai aur ultra concrete testing jo tha na aapka mai ek baar refresh karke check kar leta hu kahi usme map na ho gaya ho.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ek minute dijiye ga.
Customer: Ek do teen char theek hai.
Customer: Concrete tester wala jo tha sir wo maine product aapke usme add kar diya hai theek hai.
Customer: Aap ek baar product pe click karke ek baar check kar lijiye teen product hai.
Customer: Water leak detector ye ek mahine pehle add kara tha sir isme detail aapne dala nahi tha maine apne end pe dal diya hai.
Customer: Google se check karke ek baar check kar lijiyega price ya kuch aur cheeze change karna ho.
Executive: Nahi wo sahi hai.
Customer: Bose wala hum logo ko deal nahi karna hai isko mai abhi deactivate mark kar deta hu waha se aap delete kar dijiyega kyuki other product hai waha pe trademark ka kuch issue aa sakta hai wo.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Dusra hi product ultrasonic concrete tester hoga jiska 25000 price aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Ye do product ka ek baar check kar lijiyega kuch usme changes karna ho aap directly bata sakte hai ya direct wahi pe edit pe click karke dikha sakte hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai baki abhi kaise kya wgera chal raha hai sir kuch issue wgera to nahi aa raha theek hai na.
Executive: Nahi abhi theek chal raha hai.
Customer: Theek hai kuch issue ho to matlab aapke paas mera number already hai whatsapp wala bhi aap directly ko seedhe connect kar lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay sir thank you for the help.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add product details.

- Issue with Bose product name.

- Wants to map concrete tester product.



Resolution:

- Executive assisted with adding product details.

- Executive guided to remove Bose product.

- Executive assisted in mapping concrete tester.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- product details, category, buylead, concrete tester
